page.title: 04Schools.Hazel Grove,Norbury
page.content: One of the oldest schools in this area is{Norbury C.of E(Aided)Primary. It was first built in 1835 and the original building is still standing and used each day. The school celebrated its 150th anniversary on the 10th July,1985. All the children and staff dressed in period costume for the day. In the afternoon the children were presented with commemorative books and glasses. A special service was held to celebrate the involvement of the Church in the education system. This was also a sad time because the school will shortly be moving to a new building on a new site. Most of the schools in the area are now in new buildings in pleasant surroundings with good playing fields at each school.
